name: UNITED GOSPEL MISSION
briefDescription: We are a faith based, community oriented charity organisation, that depends on sole contributions of our well wishers. We are working on issues/projects related to Girl Child, Orphans, Women, Unemployed youth, & Drinking water. Currently our work is in 7 needy states of North India, serving as a Network of  75 small NGOs and over 1500 beneficiaries of various age groups regardless of sex,creed, or religious background.
